text: Jean Chassang (born 8 February 1951) is a former French racing cyclist. His sporting career began with VC Sant Pourcain. He rode in six editions of the Tour de France between 1976 and 1982. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Allier Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Jean Chassang
